title: Jenkins and Jonez - The NBA vs. COVID Rematch + A Chris Crack Interview
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - The NBA vs. COVID Rematch + A Chris Crack Interview
description:
The guys debate what the NBA should do about the latest COVID-19 outbreak in the league, congratulate Urban Meyer on getting fired, and talk about fake boxing that’s actually real boxing before welcoming rapper Chris Crack to the show. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
